item.title: Symposium The Psychology of Gossip - Cooperative and Competitive Functions
item.description: I organized a symposium on how gossip can have both cooperative (or prosocial) or competitve (or proself) functions. The symposium includes 4 talks taking an evolutionary perspective on the functions gossip. In the symposium, I present my work on how gossip and reputation in everyday life can function to enable reputation-based cooperation.
